item.title: Tuyen add a quote by Swami Beyondananda
item.description: "The bad news: There is no key to the universe. The good news: It was never locked." -- Swami Beyondananda

item.title: Tuyen add a quote by Swami Beyondananda
item.description: "Broken Wind believed that we are traumatized as babies by intestinal gas or colic. The great shaman invented a technique called "gastral projection" to help release these traumas. His philosophy was simple: "To air is human ... but to really cut one loose is divine." -- Swami Beyondananda

item.title: Tuyen add a quote by Swami Beyondananda
item.description: "He studied with the guru of rock nâ€™ roll, Baba Oom Mow Mow, who taught his own version of the Golden Rule: "Do wop unto others as you would have them do wop unto you." -- Swami Beyondananda

item.title: Tuyen add a quote by Swami Beyondananda
item.description: "His accelerated path to yogihood hit a dead end when his kundalini exploded in a crowded department store. No one else was injured, but Swami caught an inflection which left him with a permanent East Indian accent." -- Swami Beyondananda
